3: All the weird stuff I said before... Just pretend that never happened.

4: That might be a bit hard.

3: There are many things I don't like about this squad, but what I don't like most is you...

2: Well, that came out of the blue.
4: I didn't say anything to make you mad, did I?

3: Well, I always speak my mind.
You're just an ordinary commandant, but you always do the impossible.
You always have the silliest tactics, but they always work out as expected.
You don't have our combat ability, yet you're stronger than all of us...
And you have such a contagious attitude!
That's why I don't like you. Put simply, I can't stand anything about you.
I can't stand your undying optimism!
I can't stand that you treat everyone fairly!
I can't stand that... you always bond with other Constructs!
Am I not strong enough? Or do you think I'm...
W-what kind of weird thing is that to say?
